# Stone Metamorphosis (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]] \[[[Earth Spells|earth]]]

**Level:** [[4th Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 4]], [[4th Level Druid Spells|Druid 4]], [[6th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 6]], [[6th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 6]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 7th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 7]], [[BoXM 7th-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 7]], [[BoXM 11th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 11]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M/DF

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Stone object touched, up to 10 cu. ft. + 1 cu. ft./level

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Underdark (WotC), pg. 61

You can change an existing piece of rock to another type of rock. For instance, you can make crumblestone into granite, substantially strengthening it. Precious and semiprecious gems cannot be manufactured with this spell, and its effect does not change the monetary value of the affected stone object.

*Arcane Material Component:* A grain of talc and a chip of obsidian.
